typeDescription.name: Question
typeDescription.description: Document annotation indicating the question for the document.

featureDescription.name: begin
featureDescription.description: The beginning of the span of annotation.

featureDescription.name: end
featureDescription.description: The end of the span of annotation.

featureDescription.name: answers
featureDescription.description: Array of the answer choices for this question.

featureDescription.name: tokenization
featureDescription.description: The tokens identified for this question.

featureDescription.name: ngrams
featureDescription.description: Array of ngram sets identified for this question.

featureDescription.name: annotator
featureDescription.description: The name of the test element annotator which produced this annotation.

typeDescription.name: Answer
typeDescription.description: Annotation indicating an answer choice for the document.

featureDescription.name: begin
featureDescription.description: The beginning of the span of annotation for this answer choice.

featureDescription.name: end
featureDescription.description: The end of the span of annotation for this answer choice.

featureDescription.name: correct
featureDescription.description: Boolean indicating correctness of this answer choice under "gold" labels.

featureDescription.name: tokenization
featureDescription.description: The result of tokenizing this answer choice.

featureDescription.name: ngrams
featureDescription.description: Array of ngram sets resulting from ngram annotation on this answer choice.

featureDescription.name: scoring
featureDescription.description: The result of scoring this answer choice.

featureDescription.name: annotator
featureDescription.description: The name of the test element annotator which produced this annotation.

typeDescription.name: QuestionNgramSet
typeDescription.description: Document Annotation indicating the ngrams identified in the question for the document.

featureDescription.name: ngrams
featureDescription.description: List of ngrams identified for the given cardinality n for this question.

featureDescription.name: n
featureDescription.description: The cardinality of the ngrams identified in this QuestionNgramSet.

featureDescription.name: annotator
featureDescription.description: The name of the annotator which produced this annotation.

typeDescription.name: AnswerNgramSet
typeDescription.description: Annotation indicating the ngrams identified in an answer choice for the document.

featureDescription.name: ngrams
featureDescription.description: List of ngrams identified for the given cardinality n for this answer.

featureDescription.name: n
featureDescription.description: The cardinality of the ngrams identified in this QuestionNgramSet.

featureDescription.name: annotator
featureDescription.description: The name of the annotator which produced this annotation.

typeDescription.name: AnswerScore
typeDescription.description: Annotation indicating the score assigned to an answer choice for the document.

featureDescription.name: score
featureDescription.description: The score assigned to this answer by the analysis engine.

featureDescription.name: annotator
featureDescription.description: The name of the annotator which produced this annotation.

typeDescription.name: QuestionTokenization
typeDescription.description: Document Annotation indicating the tokens identified in the question for the document.

featureDescription.name: tokens
featureDescription.description: The tokens identified in the question.

featureDescription.name: annotator
featureDescription.description: The name of the annotator which produced this annotation.

typeDescription.name: AnswerTokenization
typeDescription.description: Annotation indicating the tokens identified in this answer choice.

featureDescription.name: tokens
featureDescription.description: The tokens identified in the answer.

featureDescription.name: annotator
featureDescription.description: The name of the annotator which produced this annotation.
